level.heading: Assignment to service steps - New employees; adjustment of existing employees; ilitary service; transfer from Board of Higher Education.
Cross References
level.text: Annuities, purchase of service credit towards years of service, see § 38-2021.08.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-78
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-78, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-1963.
